title: If you have the power to create your own group among the I-Land participants, who would make it into your group? Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well I would make it with my favourites, the ones who I truly think are very skilled and would make an amazing idol. HeeseungGeonuSunooKyungminKJayJakeTaeyongSunghoonJungwonEJHanbin
